lines.text: If you had a mirror that only reflected what you used to be, would you want to look into it?
You're the normal one, right? The one who doesn't die in the end?

[writing a note to himself]
My name is Barney Snow. I was in a car crash. Red.
[folds the paper and sticks it under a desk lamp, then sighs and removes it]
Great. I can't even remember my own name, how am I going to remember to look there?
No. Beyond curing maybe, but never beyond hope.
Billy, you're going to get in trouble riding around this late.
What are they going to do, kill me?
I'm a blank page, and all that gets written on it is people dying.
Blab on... I like the sound of it.
And I can tap dance, get in the chair.

[to Mazzo]
Now there's a new memory. Of a time not long ago, when I was just like you.
Even through the fog I was living in, the memories of you were most clear. Only you. Cassie, promise me that if a time ever comes that I don't remember any of this, tell me our story.
